website_summaries.verdict: The ideal choice if you are looking for a high-quality ice cream maker without paying Best of the Best prices.
pros: Comes with 3 adjustable speeds and a control panel
Option to purchase with a countdown timer
Works well with non-dairy ice cream
cons: Lid design has a tendency to pop off
Instructions for churning time neglected by manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Total ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 ice cream machines: This one, at $109, and two others around $35. I FAR prefer the cheaper ones. They work better, and the construction is far superior. I've tried to return this and have gotten HOURS of run around from the Amazon guy who speaks very little English. They connected me to Cuisinart who said there was no reason that Amazon shouldn't just give me a refund, and that they never should have been called, but still no help from Amazon. Don't spend the extra money thinking it will be higher quality...it is actually a low quality machine. I'm disappointed in Cuisinart for this product, and in Amazon for their POOR customer "service".
customer_reviews.author: fabulousandfree

customer_reviews.title: Recipes and machine not compatible
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for the first time last night. We followed the directions and used a recipe from the book that comes with it. The machine overflowed as the recipe book is to much for the machine! So we had to stop it 15 minutes in instead of waiting 25 minutes -- but it still tasted pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: NYMTB

customer_reviews.title: U scream, I scream, we all scream 4 this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this wonderful machine. My guys have been spoiled forever and store bought ice cream (which is really ice milk) will never be the same. Now all my family wants me to make ice cream and bring to the Holiday celebrations. The machine is easy to use, easy to clean and is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: We All Scream for Homemade Ice Cream!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Cuisinart 1 1/2 quart ice cream maker but was finding recipes to try that were more than it could handle. Enter the 2-quart Cuisinart programmable Ice Cream Maker. What a dream!!! If you are in to making homemade ice cream, this machine has your name on it. Easy to operate and clean and the end product will having you asking why you didn't do it sooner. I also bought a second freezer container so I can make 2 different flavors back-to-back.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ault

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t freeze the ice cream, makes colder soup
customer_reviews.text: Same problem as a couple others, Ice cream never freezes, after 25 min. In a completely frozen churning bowl, it’s a slightly colder soup. I have a model from cuisinart from 15 years ago which works perfectly, this new model must have something defective in the freezing bowl liquid that is supposed to maintain cold enough to freeze the batter. I am doing an exchange to give another unit one more try. Twice I have used this unit, and had to take the soup, and refreeze it in my Ice-20 model from the 90's :-(
customer_reviews.author: Michael Halker

customer_reviews.title: The Gelato Comes out Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I lived in Italy for 5 years of my life...the gelato I've made thus far is even better! The gelato comes out thick, slowly-churned, and most incredibly delicious. I've not done the Ice Cream yet, but I'm confident it, too, will work out quite well. This has been a worthwhile purchase....and it's funny, everyone seems to like to make ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Wolf (Michael)

customer_reviews.title: Really Horrible Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely disappointed with this wretched machine!!! Seriously a waste of money! I've tried a few ice cream recipes with this so called ice cream maker and it has yet to make ice cream.... all it does is just stir the mixture around!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! If you really want to make Ice cream invest in a real ice cream maker with a compressor!
customer_reviews.author: Shaynay

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed - have to hold the lid the entire time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this maker for 6 months and we’re on our THIRD bowl. Each time it works fine in the machine before we freeze it. But once we put it in the freezer - with nothing in it like the instructions specify - the bowl becomes misshapen on the bottom which means the lid to the machine will not close all the way. So now I have to hold the lid down the entire time the machine is running. Very poor design.
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I are obsessed. We have made vanilla, pistachio, and peanut butter ice cream. We started by using the machine’s recipe book, but decided to try our own recipes without using eggs. Tastes better than any ice cream we have purchased anywhere. We love this machine! Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to store!!! Make sure to follow directions and keep bowl in the freezer. We usually just store it in the freezer. Also, be sure to refrigerate the mixture for a few hours or even over night. This will ensure the best and tastiest ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Love it. First batch I made was Fresh Peach and it turn out perfectly. Since, I have made several other flavors and they always turn out great. Just make sure the bowl is frozen thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This does not have a compressor in it. It will not chill on its own. You put the liner in freezer for required time, pour your favorite ice cream recipe in and all this machine does is turn the liner while the product freezes. When purchased we thought there was a compressor and it chilled on its own. That's why it got 2 stars. If looking for this type of ice cream maker, it works, but it's not the type that freezes ice cream via self contained compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Freeze the bowl before making anything.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I am experimenting with a lot of recipes and so far so good. The machine is a bit loud but that’s okay. I recommend buying an extra bowl insert so you can make multiple batches at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Islandnana

customer_reviews.title: Better than B&J
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes the best ice cream I've ever had. It's easy to use, easy to clean, fast, relatively quiet. The separate options for ice cream, sorbet, and gelato all do what they're meant to do. We've made all three, all excellent. You'll never buy your ice cream again (just don't forget to freeze the bowl for spur-of-the-moment dessert).
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: This machine broke after my second use. The paddles are very flimsy and they shattered in my ice cream even though I followed all instructions
customer_reviews.author: Growing in Christ

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions. A great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. I recommend you read the instruction first before you make this. The inside bowl must be placed in the freezer for 12-24 hours. I put mine in the evening before I would make the ice cream. Do turn it on before you pour your ice cream mixture in. I did not once and it immediately froze to the bottom and I was not able to make ice cream until the bowl thawed out so I could clean my mess. This is a fun experience. I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Oates

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice cream maker! I can have homemade (soft serve) ice cream in 25 minutes. However, you have to completely freeze the mixing bowl and mix your ingredients at least 2 hrs before making ice cream. We just keep our mixing bowl in the freezer so we don’t have to really plan ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice cream/Gelato maker
customer_reviews.text: I love ice cream and gelato and so I decided to get my own machine so I can enjoy my favorite desserts whenever I want. This machine is very easy to use and the instruction manual comes with some recipes. I have used it for several weeks now making ice cream and gelato...I always get great results. Clean up is also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Small Castle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ice Cream Maker!!
customer_reviews.text: We made homemade ice cream for 4th of July and it was fantastic!! Very easy to use and set up! Clean up is a breeze!! Love the compact of the product!! I've owned ice cream makers back in the 1990's and this one reminds me of the one I previously owned!! Great brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggi Harris

customer_reviews.title: We love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Wow do we love this little machine. Our friends had one and "churned" the ice cream while we ate dinner. It makes the perfect amount for 4-6 people. We now keep the ingredients for good old vanilla or coffee ice cream on hand so whenever it strikes our fancy we whip some up. And I love that you don't have to use ice or salt! All you have to do is keep the bowl stored in the freezer for instant use. Perfect for when the grandchildren come by.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased I chose this ice cream maker for my home. I made Gelato first and it came out nicely. Ice Cream came out well too, but I would recommend getting a Gelato spade to scoop out the finished product as it is harder to get out of the container than Gelato is. The spade is very good for gelato scooping too. I recommend this highly, and following the recipes exactly for the finished product you desire. I have not made frozen yogurt or sorbet yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Infantino

customer_reviews.title: Yum!  Homemade Ice Cream!
customer_reviews.text: We have been ice cream making maniacs since we got this ice cream maker. We love it. It makes really creamy ice cream and great sorbet. It’s super easy to use and clean up. Be sure to read all directions. No Dishwasher! Also/ be sure your drum is good and frozen for the best results !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience of Product!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an updated version of my old Cuisinart ice cream maker. I decided to purchase this one because it had preset timers for ice cream, gelato and sorbet. I love that I can create my batch of ice cream (I use coconut milk with fruit usually), pour it in the frozen drum, select the time, turn it on and walk away. In 25 minutes I have delicious soft serve ice cream which sets up firmly in the freezer over night. Not only is it yummy but I also can control the amount of sugar and ingredients to make it a more healthier treat. I highly recommend this product, so far I am very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunstar60

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Usually I mix the cream in my blender and then refrigerate it. That's what I landed up doing with this Cruisinart unit because it did absolutely nothing! Product update - I have to update my review because the failure appears to have been caused by the recipe, not the machine. I followed the manufacturers directions and found their recipe called for too much sugar. Also I apparently added too much product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use. It does not put the air into the ice cream or yogurt but it makes having homemade ice cream in a short amount of time convenient. There are lots of recipes in the book to try but also online that you can use. Product came on time and is beautiful and very lightweight. The lid’s catch is a little wonky but works. If I were to improve anything it would be that. After use we clean and dry then put back in the freezer for the next time we want ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: MML

customer_reviews.title: One flaw makes the whole thing unusable as is.
customer_reviews.text: I guess this didn't happen for everyone, but my ice cream maker came with a defective lid. The lid doesn't actually snap in place at all. According to the instructions it's supposed to, but mine pops out no matter which way try to snap it in. This wouldn't be a big deal except that the lid is what hols everything in place while your ice cream is being made. There is a way around it...painters tape. Unfortunately, I have to tape my lid down on all 4 sides with painters tape to make my ice cream. To be fair, it makes great ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids, parties - easy to use - ready in 20min
customer_reviews.text: Let your kids run wild making the ice cream of their dreams. This is such a wonderful easy to use and easy to clean gadget for the kitchen. it's quick and easy - just add the ingredients and push a button. Watch it spin and work and in just a few minutes you'll have gelato, sherbet, or ice cream. Our new favorite kitchen tool and we use it for parties and to take a quick dessert to friend's houses. In fact it looks so nice and is compact such that you could leave it on the counter all summer so you can quickly whip up your latest cold desire.
customer_reviews.author: PACE

customer_reviews.title: The unit works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Since deciding to be vegan, my husband and son have really missed ice cream. Since getting the Cuisinart we have been making fruit sorbet at least twice a week, using blueberries from our garden, as well as bananas, mangos, pineapple, coconut milk, watermelon, etc. The unit works like a dream. No recipe is really needed. Just puree some fruit in a blender, sweeten to taste, and add in a can of coconut milk to enhance creaminess.
customer_reviews.author: douglas nagy

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions and follow directions with freezing canister prior to first use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and has recipe/instruction manual to further help anyone with initial set-up. Make sure to put canister in freezer for at least 24hours prior to attempting to use so that it will give best results. I made a simple vanilla ice cream recipe after leaving canister in freezer for 24 hours and it was ready in 25 minutes. It has a slight noise that can get annoying if you’re in the room with it. Great product and simple to use!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: We have now used this for about a year and have tried the ice cream, sorbet and gelato settings. It has worked very well. It may be a bit pricey, and the digital settings are a bit much, but the bottom line is that it makes fine ice cream and, especially, gelato. This unit uses a rotating bowl; other units we have had used a rotating paddle that eventually broke. This unit is easy to clean. It seems to be durable. The bowl doesn't take up too much room in the freezer. It's small enough to store out of sight. We are pleased with it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Mordes

customer_reviews.title: A fun appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun to make your own ice cream. Creates creamy delicious treats for our grandkids. They order a new flavor each week. This is a real upgrade from the old hand crank units of The past.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I am completely in love with this machine. It makes ice cream that is so fluffy, light, and delicious, then turns a slower, less air churn, for a great dense gelato. Sorbet, no problem, frozen yogurt.. delicious and easy. And it's fast! I made the base recipe from "Ratio" that I have made with several ice cream makers, including the Kitchenaid bowl that cracked... and this turned out by far the best and fastest. This comes with a nice recipe book and excellent instructions. It does need somewhere in the freezer to store a two quart freezer bowl. This is so easy to use and makes excellent frozen treats
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! It does make a soft serve ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day! He absolutely loves it! He has already made ice cream 3 times, all of them last week! I highly suggest buying at least one extra freezing bowl! It's easy to clean, you just need to wait for the bowl to warm up enough to get the residual ice cream cleaned off! It does make a soft serve ice cream! If you prefer it to be harder just place in a good quality container (Sumo) and place in freezer. Would buy again even though it is somewhat noisy!
customer_reviews.author: GeDi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous ice cream with one slight flaw
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a fabulous product. Easy to use, clean, and enjoy. Makes really good ice cream. BUT the lid wobbles, and won’t lock on when making ice cream. We have to really tape it down.
customer_reviews.author: Debi S.

customer_reviews.title: Made ice cream work perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I finally mde ice cream in my brand new Cuisinart Ice Cream maker. We (wife and I) made strawberry ice cream and it took almost 20 minutes for ice cream and it was creamy like soft ice cream yogurt. The sound was comfortable enough that we did not noticed. We made ice cream from start to end of the cycle. The key is freezed the bowl and ingredients are cold. We will post follow on comments a later time. Very satisfy with purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz-Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great icecream maker!
customer_reviews.text: Made my first batch of ice cream yesterday and this thing does a wonderful job. Fresh and delicious vanilla ice cream is what I had yesterday and it was certainly some of the best ice cream I've ever had. The only complaint that I have about this ice cream maker and I wont knock a star off for it, but it is loud. I don't quite understand why or how this machine is loud, but it is, it is loud enough to make people wonder what in the world you are doing in that kitchen haha. Other than that, it does the job and I really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: I Love this ice cream maker. I am a huge fan of the Cuisinart brand and have not had any issues with this ice cream maker. The only "con" is that it isn't larger! I have made various types of ice cream in this device and haven't had any issues. It is quite noisy but that was to be expected since I had read the other reviews on this product. Overall, I would recommend this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Hammac

customer_reviews.title: easy ice cream
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most efficient and easy to use. I just had to figure out the correct recipe to use for vanilla ice cream to have the taste as close to homemade Blue Bell as possible. 2 eggs, pinch of salt, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, Wisk together. 1 can sweetened condensed milk(cheap brand) half and half to fill. Wisk all ingredients. Set timer for 38 minutes and stop as desired thickness. More minutes than auto setting is required for immediate use. My Husband the Grands love this recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Cream
customer_reviews.text: This amazing machine is the real deal! I was an old-school ice & salt ice cream maker but this new style machine is a dream. Have made 4 different ice cream and one custard gelato, all truly fantastic and so much better than commercial brands. Follow the directions and recipes in the included booklet and you'll be rewarded with the ice cream you remember as a kid.😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash!
customer_reviews.text: Two months in and the control panel has stopped working all together. Just another American company that manufactures its product overseas (China). Currently own 3 different Cuisinart product and all of them have design flaws but this one is the worst! No more Cuisinart products in this household, period. Going back to the old fashioned hand crank and rock salt, it's a big pain in the rear but makes a much better product instead of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy.  reminds me of one i had as kid that you had to turn handle for 20
customer_reviews.text: super easy same kind of clyinder have to put in freezer for like 12 hours, take whataver you want put it in and presto in 40 min or so you have ice cream, sorbet, italian ice, gelato, etc. only diff is ingredients and time it mixes around, its quite noisy so i put it in laundry room. which is off of kitchen. great item. we love it, but you may not want to hear it. beautiful chrome or stainless around. clear plastic top which locks on when mixing so kid cant accidently get hurt. great idea.
customer_reviews.author: me2

customer_reviews.title: So Happy with this Ice Cream Maker!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product and excellent service. We use this wonderfully fast, super easy to use, Ice Cream Maker to make all of our yummy homemade Sugar-free Ice Creams. Get all of these recipes, and MANY more Sugar and Grain-free treats, in our Kindle eBook "Dr. Berg's Healthy Fat Burning Recipes" and you will be very happy that you did. Here's to your good health. :) CLR & RRR
customer_reviews.author: Ruffo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, love all the creations they've served me, so be creative! Bought it for 107.00 now they've jacked the price so high I cant afford to get one for myself..
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: this is so awesome... I can make super healthy ice cream at home...
customer_reviews.text: sooo good... so healthy... made halva ice cream: organic avocado organic banana organic tahini vanilla (2) dates nuts (mixed hole) oat milk and matcha OMG... best ice cream ever, sweet (not too sweet) and all foods that I would eat normally (no milk no yougry and SOOOO creamy and HARD). Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JavaScriptNinja.io

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Ice Cream Lovers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! Super simple to operate. The only hard part for me is waiting for the bowl to freeze. I've been thinking about buying an ice cream maker for years and I am so thrilled I finally broke down and just did it! My first batch was an egg based vanilla and OMG it is so good!!! Can't beat making your own ice cream. No more wondering what they put in the ice cream, everything that goes in I hand select!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: defective freezer bowl
customer_reviews.text: freezer bowl inside the machine would not freeze. It worked one time only and then after leaving it in the freezer for 2 days...still hearing water when giving it a shake. I am in the process of having a replacement sent but customer service at cuisinart isnt the most friendly sort.
customer_reviews.author: Liz june

customer_reviews.title: Makes good ice cream.
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. I was not sure how the cold was put in the machine when I got it. You need to freeze the container. It stays cold enough for more then on batch. Keep in mind that some recipes need to sit over night before you put them in the ice cream maker so many recipes are not something you can do at the last minute.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D Schepers

customer_reviews.title: It's the best Strawberry Ice cream I've ever have had
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this product deserves it! I ordered this as well as the Ben&Jerry's Ice cream Dessert Book. However I used the recipe book that was included and tried the Fresh Strawberry Ice Cream recipe. It's the best Strawberry Ice cream I've ever have had!!!! Just like all foods, there is nothing better then fresh! I put the ingredients in the freezer for 20 minutes before putting in the machine and it resulted it awesome Ice Cream! Order now!!! We all love Ice Cream!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Think hard b4 ordering. Maybe defective.
customer_reviews.text: Mine was defective. So disappointed. The cheap platic lid pops off as soon as you turn it on. Had to put my purse on top of it to hold it down, my arms were getting sore. I snapped lid in place, didn't add to much liquid. Didnt matter as soon as i pressed start POP! Maybe its a bad batch of machines. I dont know but the one I got is defective. I didnt hear back from cuisinart so I sent it back. That was disappointing as well. Ice cream tastes awesome. But for the price I expect better. You should expect better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely one of my favorite kitchen (small) appliances
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of my favorite kitchen (small) appliances. In less than 30 minutes - fresh, delicious ice cream!!! I LOVE it! I bought a second insert at the time of purchasing the ice cream maker which makes it really easy to always have one frozen and ready to go. I love that I control the amount of sugar, and can add fresh berries, chopped chocolate to the mix. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Millie R. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are too large for the unit quantity.
customer_reviews.text: Every recipe I’ve tried from the manual overflows in the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: We all love this ice cream machine. It is sooo easy. All you do is freeze the bowl over night. Mix up cream, milk, vanilla, and sugar. Pour in your frozen bowl. Put bowl in machine. Turn on 25 minutes. You now have all natural vanilla ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: The churn pops out of it's place and the top goes crazy
customer_reviews.text: This makes good ice cream, but I've had a problem with every single batch I've made. When the ice cream starts to freeze, the churn pops out of the hole it's supposed to stay in, and flops around making the lid pop up and turn around and makes a lot of noise. I now put a marble mortar and pestle on top of the lid to keep it in place. I find this to be extremely frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have used it three times. I’ve tried different recipes, and they all have turned out great. It is hard to go back to cheap store bought ice cream after making your own!! There is some initial prep the day or two before, but it’s easy and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: You can easily make your own ice cream
customer_reviews.text: It makes very good ice cream. Use almond milk, dairy-free chocolate chips, and cocoa, alongside with avocados and you have great ice cream. However, a bit too noisy, hence the -1 star.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We live in Central America where it’s hard to get good ice cream. This maker makes our own! Easy to use and gets used over and over. I bought this one for a friend. Mine has been working well for almost 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: It works great if you freeze the container overnight before making ice cream. You can only make one container at a time. Would be better if it would make more ice cream at one time. It is nice that you can have ice cream in 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I waited to buy an ice cream machine. I bought this one, and have been very pleased with it! I've made about 10 batches so far! Easy to make, love the variety, and you can use different bases! I haven't made the sorbet yet, but looking forward to! Easy to make, easy to use, easy to clean! Makes a bit of noise when making ice cream, but it doesn't take too long!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!!
customer_reviews.text: Ice cream ready in fairly amount of time, tastes great but the issue of having to freeze the bowl is a point against it. Also, the size of the bowl is unacceptable. I like that I have it but not sure if I would have bought it knowing all that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product and so easy to use. I love making ice cream in this machine. Start to finish takes about 30 minutes and the texture is great! I would recommend this product to anyone who loves homemade ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ice cream maker!!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker is amazing!! I had been using an ice cream maker that needed the salt and ice, and wow what a difference! The directions tell you to put your ice cream mix into the fridge for at least 2 hours but I decided to forego that and just dumped it right in. Wow, it turned out so creamy, like the perfect soft serve. I also made the hot fudge recipe in the booklet, delicious! The ability to make a basic ice cream in only 30 mins start to finish is so awesome. This machine is going to get a lot of use in my house!
customer_reviews.author: B.C. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade keto ice cream
customer_reviews.text: We are keto and were sick of paying $8-9 for a pint of low-carb ice cream with varying carb counts and limited flavors. This machine produces excellent texture in 25 minutes. You do need to pre-freeze the drum. We keep it in the freezer at all times. Recommend getting a second one to allow multiple batches/flavors in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia C Bumsted

customer_reviews.title: Well build and makes good Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: My wife just had to have this, and she has made ice cream with it once.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Store Bought Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: This Cuisinart makes real homemade ice cream with all fresh ingredients and no gums or artificial things that store bought ice cream has in them!! When you make your first batch you can't wait to try it - so we all ate some and it tasted like homemade whipped cream. But the next day after freezing overnight, wow! Better than the Best ice cream out there in the market. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Pangborn

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading reviews. I like the timer, and slightly above average capacity. It makes a modest noise while churning. I made a chocolate custard already and it's a big hit. Definitely enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dg5476

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gelato!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and made my first 2 batches of gelato. I followed other reviewer's suggestions and made sure all ingredients were well chilled and the drum was in the freezer for 24 hours. It worked perfectly for soft serve gelato. I put the gelato in the freezer to firm it up to hard gelato consistency. I refroze the drum after the 1st batch immediately after using it so it didn't thaw out. I refroze it overnight and it worked great the next morning. Super easy to make and clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: More than pelased
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream machine is perfect. We do set the bucket in the freezer before making ice cream in efforts to help it along but it works like a dream. My daughter was very pleased and we have made several batches over the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Compton

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome machine. I've made two batches and both have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. I've made two batches and both have turned out amazing. A great companion to this machine is the book "The Perfect Scoop" by David Lebovitz. Great recipes to really get the best out of this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value...You will not be disappointed with this unit!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance after reading all of the reviews on all Cusianrt Models: I can't be happier with this unit and value. You won't be disappointed. I do suggest you purchase a wooden spatula in order to scrap all of the ice cream from the sides of the container. Very happy and satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A.T

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Just as it was described. Made 1 I've cream and 1 sorbet now going to try a gelato. A bit loud.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one to get for home icecream making
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife for Christmas. I researched several brands and models. We've done well with Cuisinart products in the past so gave the one a go. It's really easy to use and my wife has now made about a dozen different flavors. Glad I got this model. The built in timer is actually pretty helpful to really nail the consistency. Clean up is easy and the quality of the machine makes me confident it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great Machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Best ice cream machine you will ever own! It’s easy to use and semi easy to clean. The one downside is that it’s very loud and takes up a lot of room in your freezer. Still, it doesn’t use salt (which is a HUGE win if you’re trying to save money) and it works!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Is Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Ice Cream turned out well. Is easy to clean. Is pretty noisy. I had to leave the area. Has a high pitched sound that is extremely annoying to me. Doesn’t bother my husband at all (he’s a bit hard of hearing).
customer_reviews.author: MySpouse

customer_reviews.title: Best option for ice cream makers
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on ice cream makers before deciding on this one and it's great! I'm very happy with it, makes perfect ice cream. I've had no issues with it and it's used often. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: happycustomer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious soft serve ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new ice cream maker. The first couple times it never really turned into ice cream and we had to put it in the freezer to freeze. But the next time, after the freezer bowl had been in the freezer for almost a week, it worked great! Best ice cream ever! And I love that even after I put the ice cream in the freezer it stays the soft serve consistency. We just have to keep the bowl in the freezer at least 2 or 3 days to get it to freeze properly. But that's no problem and we love it! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carlblom

customer_reviews.title: Making ice cream was never easier
customer_reviews.text: 25 minutes and ice cream is done! Love this, been here one week and made ice cream 3x already. Love this product, kids love this product - great addition that matches our stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hovey

customer_reviews.title: Who needs to go out for ice cream?
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice cream maker. It works well. Is easy to operate and clean. In less than an hour you can enjoy a delicious treat.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: 1 batch per freeze
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job with my fruit sorbets but I wish they sold another freeze-able part bc you can only do 1 batch and then you have to refreeze the part for 12 more hours. I really want to do all my sorbet in one day, not wait and do 1 batch per 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A simple, reliable, and affordable ice cream maker
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker has worked pretty well with my go-to recipes. It’s easy to use and easy to clean. The bowl is a good size (it can make plenty more than I need), and it’s relatively inexpensive to buy additional bowls for it as backups or for additional capacity if you’re looking to make a LOT of ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: elorc

customer_reviews.title: ... batch just yesterday (20th) and it looks and tastes great. Little noisier than I'd like it to be
customer_reviews.text: Tried our first batch just yesterday (20th) and it looks and tastes great. Little noisier than I'd like it to be. but I guess you can't have everything. Not an inexpensive ice cream making venture, but otherwise very rewarding, at least to ice cream lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whatever product you make is best consumed right away
customer_reviews.text: Makes yummy ice cream.My butt is getting too big. I bought it wanting to replicate chocolate gelato. I think I just need to keep experimenting with recipes. Whatever product you make is best consumed right away. I do find I don't enjoy it as much after it has been in the freezer hardening for more than a day ( even with using fancy overpriced long containers) We have made some delicious simple recipes and the machine is easy to use and clean. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLY

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ice cream maker ever! For 2 people it's perfect size and the ice cream is still soft after storing in the freezer! No mess like traditional makers! 10 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Postive experience--much better  than the old-time  ice cream makers!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to us + clean up is quick--have not made any gelatos yet but the basic ice cream is very good--without the gums/stabilizers and additives of most commercial ice cream--high quality dark cocoa makes a big difference in the chocolate ice cream...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I hear it running , see it spin. Tried 2 times , let churn for 3 hours and still liquid as water. Used recipe EXACTLY as shown in instructions manual to make ice cream. I’m pissed !!!
customer_reviews.author: RussianXXtasy

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: Great Ice Cream Maker! We are having so much fun making all kinds of fun frozen treats. It works perfectly and turns out superior ice cream with ease. It is solidly built and feels like it will be with us for years to come. This is the best Ice Cream maker we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad machine.
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn’t really fit on mine so when it’s rotating it makes a lot of noise. The rotation of the ice cream doesn’t seem to work so you have to manually adjust it and mix it yourself half way through. Not really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Neenan

customer_reviews.title: Pre freeze bucket and ice creAm mixture before you put it in the machine.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the ice cream tasted great, make sure you freeze the ice cream mixture for 2 hours before you put it in the machine. And of course the freezer bucket itself should be frozen that you don’t hear the liquid sloshing around.
customer_reviews.author: Whatcom

customer_reviews.title: Too weak to make ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Half the ice cream sticks to the bowl! Impossible to remove. Bowl has to be completely defrosted to clean. It doesn’t blend in addictives. It piles up and wants to overflow
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pure frozen deliciousness...
customer_reviews.text: Great results with various recipes of peach 🍑, strawberry 🍓, and mint chocolate 🍫 ice cream. Small paddle design change over previous similar model appears to have solved the problem of too much ice cream freezing on the side of the tub. It's very important to get the tub as cold as possible. Put it in the back of your freezer overnight, and lower the temp if necessary. If you have a free standing freezer, as we do, use that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a birthday gift and she loves it! She's made delicious ice cream and dole whip. I can't wait to see what flavor is next!
customer_reviews.author: LPD

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: We will never buy ice cream again. This makes making ice cream so easy we made three and four flavors at a time and put in the freezer in containers for a fraction of the price of high quality store-bought ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Done Casa

customer_reviews.title: We have perfected a mixture that makes wonderful ice cream without the fattening cream
customer_reviews.text: We have perfected a mixture that makes wonderful ice cream without the fattening cream. We stopped drinking milk years ago when we decided that milk is for calves, not for humans. Or stomachs are much happier now. This machine produces ice cream in 20 minutes or less. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Incredible machine
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! Homemade ice cream anytime is yummy! Made our own Keto ice cream that was delicious. I love that I know what Ingredients I’m putting in. You won’t be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jany903

customer_reviews.title: Good product but makes lot of noise.
customer_reviews.text: I makes ice-cream well but makes lot of noise. I read somewhere that it was a quiet machine. Not sure if it worth over $45-$70 product from same or different brands.
customer_reviews.author: HSB

customer_reviews.title: Paddle shattered after fewer than 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: We were loving this product until the paddle completely shattered on something like our 4th or 5th batch of ice cream over a ~6 week period.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and bought this for my classroom for our fun fridays. The kids have loved it and we have used it about 4 times. Today it started running like normal and then completely shut off and it sounds like the motor is going out! Of course I have had it over a month and now can not return it! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Feder

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy store-bought ice cream again
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on ice cream makers, and I am so glad I followed the reviews and bought this one!! Easy to use, easy to clean and it comes with some recipes ! The ice cream tastes amazing. I am super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mastin

customer_reviews.title: Better than store-bought ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Just love this ice cream machine. I have made three different kinds with it. Easy to put together an easy to make. Better than store-bought ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Olive H

customer_reviews.title: Works Just As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love the stainless finish, the larger 2 qt size, the timer and the different settings for different products. It works very well. Only negative is that it is noisy. So I just won't use it when the noise will interfere.
customer_reviews.author: kaj

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for ice cream. I like control of the ingredients and as long as you add some vodka it don't freeze solid when you put the leftovers in the freezer
customer_reviews.author: Dari

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Cream Maker I've Used
customer_reviews.text: This guy is perfect. Easily made ice cream with no ice or salt. Put the container in the freezer over night before adding your ingredients and you will will have the best homemade ice cream with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

product_meta.title: Cuisinart ICE-70 Electronic Ice Cream Maker, Brushed Chrome, Ice Cream Maker with Countdown Timer, With Countdown Timer
product_meta.description: Color:Ice Cream Maker with Countdown Timer| Style Name:With Countdown TimerThe Cuisinart Electronic Ice Cream Maker makes 2 qts of ice cream in just 20 minutes! The machine includes a lid with ingredient spout and integrated measuring cup, a 2 qt freezer bowl and an improved paddle for faster processing time. The housing is a sleek brushed chrome with a simple LCD display with pushpad settings for ice cream, gelato or sorbet. It's also great for making frozen yogurt! The machine even features a count-down timer and shuts off automatically. Includes full instructions and a selection of recipes. Manufacturer's 3 year limited warranty. Measures 9.7\" l x 8.6\" w x 13.2\" h.
feature_bullets: Makes 2-quarts of ice cream, frozen yogurt, gelato or sorbet , UC Cubic Feet - 1.65 inches
Improved paddle with faster processing time
Countdown timer with auto shutoff. MC Cubic Feet: 3.30
Ingredient spout with integrated measuring cup
Control panel with LCD screen and 3 settings with multiple speeds. UC LWH - 12.50 x 12.88 x 18.00 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,696 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
